meanings.definition: Cultivated jointly by two or more individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: The cocultivated garden was tended by both friends.
meanings.sent2: The cocultivated project was a success thanks to teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The cocultivated flowers seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Their cocultivated efforts bloomed into a beautiful friendship.
meanings.sent5: The cocultivated field was a colorful patchwork of unity.

meanings.definition: To grow or tend plants together with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: We cocultivated the vegetables in our community garden.
meanings.sent2: They cocultivated the orchard and shared the harvest.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors cocultivated a jungle of tomato plants in their backyard.
meanings.sent4: She cocultivated a lush garden with her gardening club.
meanings.sent5: The farmers cocultivated the land, creating a bountiful harvest.
